name: Hot's Dogs
description:
LUDUM DARE 47 ENTRY

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/hots-dogs 

On Donut Island, DoughCo. rules the food biz with an iron fist, but the island’s citizens crave something new!

It’s time to get your buns in gear and ketch up with DoughCo.

Explore, feed the locals, make some dough, find upgrades, and try to become the Top Dog of Donut Island!

We hope this will be an experience you will relish!

Thanks for playing!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Q - Yeet thy dog
  • E - Special ability (when unlocked)
